definitions.body: id. (transp. from [[שִׂמְלָה]]);—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Ex 22:8 +, cstr. [[שַׂלְמַת]] v:Ex 22:25; sf. [[שַׂלְמָתוֹ]] De 24:13; pl. [[שְׂלָמוֹת]] Jos 9:5 +, sf. [[שַׂלְמׂתֵיהֶם]] v:Jos 9:13, etc.;—garment (of man or [Ct So 4:11] woman): outer garment Ex 22:8, Ex 22:25 (E), Jos 9:5, Jos 9:13 (JE), De 24:13, 1Ki 11:29, 1Ki 11:30, Ps 104:2 (fig.); in gen. clothes (pl.) De 29:4, Ne 9:21, Job 9:31, Ct So 4:11; as costly gifts 1Ki 10:25 = 2Ch 9:24; as booty Jos 22:8 (late).—Mic 2:8 rd. prob. [[שׁׂלְמׂה]]) Roorda, RS:Proph. vii. N. 4), or [[שׁׂלְמִים]] (We Now GASm), him (those) at peace (with him), cf. LXX SyrVer. p. 969
